29class Isolate;

31namespace internal {
32
33class CppMarkingState;
34class EmbedderStackStateScope;
35class MinorGCHeapGrowing;
36
37// A C++ heap implementation used with V8 to implement unified heap.
38class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE CppHeap final
39 : public cppgc::internal::HeapBase,
40 public v8::CppHeap,
41 public cppgc::internal::StatsCollector::AllocationObserver,
42 public cppgc::internal::GarbageCollector {
43 public:
44 enum GarbageCollectionFlagValues : uint8_t {
45 kNoFlags = 0,
46 kReduceMemory = 1 << 1,
47 kForced = 1 << 2,
48 };
49
50 using GarbageCollectionFlags = base::Flags<GarbageCollectionFlagValues>;
51 using StackState = cppgc::internal::StackState;
52 using CollectionType = cppgc::internal::CollectionType;
53
54 class MetricRecorderAdapter final : public cppgc::internal::MetricRecorder {
55 public:
56 static constexpr int kMaxBatchedEvents = 16;
57
58 explicit MetricRecorderAdapter(CppHeap& cpp_heap) : cpp_heap_(cpp_heap) {}
59
60 void AddMainThreadEvent(const GCCycle& cppgc_event) final;
61 void AddMainThreadEvent(const MainThreadIncrementalMark& cppgc_event) final;
62 void AddMainThreadEvent(
63 const MainThreadIncrementalSweep& cppgc_event) final;
64
65 void FlushBatchedIncrementalEvents();
66
67 // The following methods are only used for reporting nested cpp events
68 // through V8. Standalone events are reported directly.
69 bool FullGCMetricsReportPending() const;
70 bool YoungGCMetricsReportPending() const;
71
72 const base::Optional<cppgc::internal::MetricRecorder::GCCycle>
73 ExtractLastFullGcEvent();
74 const base::Optional<cppgc::internal::MetricRecorder::GCCycle>
75 ExtractLastYoungGcEvent();
76 const base::Optional<
77 cppgc::internal::MetricRecorder::MainThreadIncrementalMark>
78 ExtractLastIncrementalMarkEvent();
79
80 void ClearCachedEvents();
81
82 private:
83 Isolate* GetIsolate() const;
84
85 v8::metrics::Recorder::ContextId GetContextId() const;
86
87 CppHeap& cpp_heap_;
88 v8::metrics::GarbageCollectionFullMainThreadBatchedIncrementalMark
89 incremental_mark_batched_events_;
90 v8::metrics::GarbageCollectionFullMainThreadBatchedIncrementalSweep
91 incremental_sweep_batched_events_;
92 base::Optional<cppgc::internal::MetricRecorder::GCCycle>
93 last_full_gc_event_;
94 base::Optional<cppgc::internal::MetricRecorder::GCCycle>
95 last_young_gc_event_;
96 base::Optional<cppgc::internal::MetricRecorder::MainThreadIncrementalMark>
97 last_incremental_mark_event_;
98 };
99
100 class PauseConcurrentMarkingScope final {
101 public:
102 explicit PauseConcurrentMarkingScope(CppHeap*);
103
104 private:
105 base::Optional<cppgc::internal::MarkerBase::PauseConcurrentMarkingScope>
106 pause_scope_;
107 };
108
109 static void InitializeOncePerProcess();
110
111 static CppHeap* From(v8::CppHeap* heap) {
112 return static_cast<CppHeap*>(heap);
113 }
114 static const CppHeap* From(const v8::CppHeap* heap) {
115 return static_cast<const CppHeap*>(heap);
116 }
117
118 CppHeap(v8::Platform*,
119 const std::vector<std::unique_ptr<cppgc::CustomSpaceBase>>&,
120 const v8::WrapperDescriptor&, cppgc::Heap::MarkingType,
121 cppgc::Heap::SweepingType);
122 ~CppHeap() final;
123
124 CppHeap(const CppHeap&) = delete;
125 CppHeap& operator=(const CppHeap&) = delete;
126
127 HeapBase& AsBase() { return *this; }
128 const HeapBase& AsBase() const { return *this; }
129
130 void AttachIsolate(Isolate* isolate);
131 void DetachIsolate();
132
133 void Terminate();
134
135 void CollectCustomSpaceStatisticsAtLastGC(
136 std::vector<cppgc::CustomSpaceIndex>,
137 std::unique_ptr<CustomSpaceStatisticsReceiver>);
138
139 void FinishSweepingIfRunning();
140 void FinishAtomicSweepingIfRunning();
141 void FinishSweepingIfOutOfWork();
142
143 void InitializeMarking(
144 CollectionType,
145 GarbageCollectionFlags = GarbageCollectionFlagValues::kNoFlags);
146 void StartMarking();
147 bool AdvanceTracing(v8::base::TimeDelta max_duration);
148 bool IsTracingDone() const;
149 void FinishMarkingAndStartSweeping();
150 void EnterFinalPause(cppgc::EmbedderStackState stack_state);
151 bool FinishConcurrentMarkingIfNeeded();
152
153 // This method is used to re-enable concurrent marking when the isolate is
154 // moved into the foreground. This method expects that concurrent marking was
155 // not started initially because the isolate was in the background but is
156 // still generally supported.
157 void ReEnableConcurrentMarking();
158
159 void WriteBarrier(Tagged<JSObject>);
160 void WriteBarrier(void*);
161
162 bool ShouldFinalizeIncrementalMarking() const;
163
164 // StatsCollector::AllocationObserver interface.
165 void AllocatedObjectSizeIncreased(size_t) final;
166 void AllocatedObjectSizeDecreased(size_t) final;
167 void ResetAllocatedObjectSize(size_t) final {}
168
169 MetricRecorderAdapter* GetMetricRecorder() const;
170
171 v8::WrapperDescriptor wrapper_descriptor() const {
172 return wrapper_descriptor_;
173 }
174
175 Isolate* isolate() const { return isolate_; }
176
177 size_t used_size() const {
178 return used_size_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
179 }
180 size_t allocated_size() const { return allocated_size_; }
181
182 ::heap::base::Stack* stack() final;
183
184 std::unique_ptr<CppMarkingState> CreateCppMarkingState();
185 std::unique_ptr<CppMarkingState> CreateCppMarkingStateForMutatorThread();
186
187 // cppgc::internal::GarbageCollector interface.
188 void CollectGarbage(cppgc::internal::GCConfig) override;
189
190 std::optional<cppgc::EmbedderStackState> overridden_stack_state()
191 const override;
192 void set_override_stack_state(cppgc::EmbedderStackState state) override;
193 void clear_overridden_stack_state() override;
194
195 void StartIncrementalGarbageCollection(cppgc::internal::GCConfig) override;
196 size_t epoch() const override;
197#ifdef V8_ENABLE_ALLOCATION_TIMEOUT
198 v8::base::Optional<int> UpdateAllocationTimeout() final;
199#endif // V8_ENABLE_ALLOCATION_TIMEOUT
200
201 V8_INLINE void RememberCrossHeapReferenceIfNeeded(
202 v8::internal::Tagged<v8::internal::JSObject> host_obj, void* value);
203 template <typename F>
204 inline void VisitCrossHeapRememberedSetIfNeeded(F f);
205 void ResetCrossHeapRememberedSet();
206
207 // Testing-only APIs.
208 void EnableDetachedGarbageCollectionsForTesting();
209 void CollectGarbageForTesting(CollectionType, StackState);
210 void UpdateGCCapabilitiesFromFlagsForTesting();
211
212 private:
213 void UpdateGCCapabilitiesFromFlags();
214
215 void FinalizeIncrementalGarbageCollectionIfNeeded(
216 cppgc::Heap::StackState) final {
217 // For unified heap, CppHeap shouldn't finalize independently (i.e.
218 // finalization is not needed) thus this method is left empty.
219 }
220
221 void ReportBufferedAllocationSizeIfPossible();
222
223 void StartIncrementalGarbageCollectionForTesting() final;
224 void FinalizeIncrementalGarbageCollectionForTesting(
225 cppgc::EmbedderStackState) final;
226
227 MarkingType SelectMarkingType() const;
228 SweepingType SelectSweepingType() const;
229
230 bool TracingInitialized() const { return collection_type_.has_value(); }
231
232 bool IsGCForbidden() const override;
233 bool IsGCAllowed() const override;
234 bool IsDetachedGCAllowed() const;
235
236 Heap* heap() const { return heap_; }
237
238 Isolate* isolate_ = nullptr;
239 Heap* heap_ = nullptr;
240 bool marking_done_ = true;
241 // |collection_type_| is initialized when marking is in progress.
242 base::Optional<CollectionType> collection_type_;
243 GarbageCollectionFlags current_gc_flags_;
244
245 std::unique_ptr<MinorGCHeapGrowing> minor_gc_heap_growing_;
246 CrossHeapRememberedSet cross_heap_remembered_set_;
247
248 std::unique_ptr<cppgc::internal::Sweeper::SweepingOnMutatorThreadObserver>
249 sweeping_on_mutator_thread_observer_;
250
251 // Buffered allocated bytes. Reporting allocated bytes to V8 can trigger a GC
252 // atomic pause. Allocated bytes are buffer in case this is temporarily
253 // prohibited.
254 int64_t buffered_allocated_bytes_ = 0;
255
256 v8::WrapperDescriptor wrapper_descriptor_;
257
258 bool in_detached_testing_mode_ = false;
259 bool force_incremental_marking_for_testing_ = false;
260 bool is_in_v8_marking_step_ = false;
261
262 // Used size of objects. Reported to V8's regular heap growing strategy.
263 std::atomic<size_t> used_size_{0};
264 // Total bytes allocated since the last GC. Monotonically increasing value.
265 // Used to approximate allocation rate.
266 size_t allocated_size_ = 0;
267 // Limit for |allocated_size| in bytes to avoid checking for starting a GC
268 // on each increment.
269 size_t allocated_size_limit_for_check_ = 0;
270
271 std::optional<cppgc::EmbedderStackState> detached_override_stack_state_;
272 std::unique_ptr<v8::internal::EmbedderStackStateScope>
273 override_stack_state_scope_;
274#ifdef V8_ENABLE_ALLOCATION_TIMEOUT
275 // Use standalone RNG to avoid initialization order dependency.
276 base::Optional<v8::base::RandomNumberGenerator> allocation_timeout_rng_;
277#endif // V8_ENABLE_ALLOCATION_TIMEOUT
278
279 friend class MetricRecorderAdapter;
280};
281
282void CppHeap::RememberCrossHeapReferenceIfNeeded(
283 v8::internal::Tagged<v8::internal::JSObject> host_obj, void* value) {
284 if (!generational_gc_supported()) return;
285 DCHECK(isolate_);
286 cross_heap_remembered_set_.RememberReferenceIfNeeded(*isolate_, host_obj,
287 value);
288}
289
290template <typename F>
291void CppHeap::VisitCrossHeapRememberedSetIfNeeded(F f) {
292 if (!generational_gc_supported()) return;
293 DCHECK(isolate_);
294 cross_heap_remembered_set_.Visit(*isolate_, std::move(f));
295}
296
297DEFINE_OPERATORS_FOR_FLAGS(CppHeap::GarbageCollectionFlags)
298
299} // namespace internal
300} // namespace v8
